snippet: Residents of Lakewood have lost Exit 88 on the Garden State Parkway as part of a plan to improve connections with local roads.
abstract: Exit 88 on New Jersey's Garden State Parkway is closed as part of plan to improve connections between parkway and local roads serving Lakewood, fastest-growing town in state.
lead_paragraph: Residents of Lakewood have lost Exit 88 on the Garden State Parkway as part of a plan to improve connections with local roads.

headline.main: ‘What Exit?’ For Some in New Jersey, the Answer Has Changed
headline.print_headline: In New Jersey, Some Must Adjust Answer to ‘What Exit?’
